description:
Wear these cold-weather pants when you anticipate pushing hard. A windproof, breathable layer that suits fast moving skiers and winter runners. The moisture-wicking fabric used in the back panels is key to staying dry and warm.

  • Front panel uses windproof polyester and polyurethane soft shell fabric, treated with DWR for water-resistance
  • Back panel is polyester and spandex with a flat outer face and brushed inner that wicks moisture
  • Flat-locked seams are smooth and soft against skin
  • Elastic waistband has a drawcord, for personalized fit
name: MEC Mistral Pants - Youths
